DOC.brief_title: OptiScanner Versus Standard Blood Glucose Monitoring
DOC.criteria: Signed Informed consent . Age ≥ 18 year . Admitted ICU Erasme University Hospital . Expected ICU stay ≥ 3 day time enrollment ( judged Principle Investigator ) . APACHE II score ≥ 10 , within first 24 hour ICU admission . Existing central venous catheter + arterial catheter . No participation investigational interventional study enrol study . Hyperglycemia ( BG > 150 mg/dl ) time admission . Pregnancy .
